programme.desc: Hull FC v Catalan Dragons (Kick-off 1.30pm). Coverage of the quarter-final match from KCOM Stadium. These two sides have been in blistering form in the Super League, and each will be hoping to carry that over into this knockout game and move one step closer to Wembley. The Airlie Birds last reached the showpiece game in 2013, but were disappointing in a 16-0 loss to Wigan Warriors, while the French side's only appearance in the final came in 2007, when they went down 30-8 to St Helens.(n)
